create_command: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS command (no SERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, datetime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), job_id INTEGER NOT NULL, parent_job INTEGER, event_id TEXT, requestor TEXT NOT NULL, task TEXT NOT NULL, input_path TEXT, group_name TEXT, config1 TEXT, config2 TEXT, status INTEGER , root_path TEXT, image_pair1 TEXT, image_pair2 TEXT, result_id INTEGER, result_msg TEXT, terminate INTEGER);
create_task_manager: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS job_manager (job_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, pid1 TEXT, pid2 TEXT, cancel TEXT, cancel_date TIMESTAMP, complete TEXT, complete_date TIMESTAMP);
create_tracking: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS calib_data (job_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, datetime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), result JSON );
create_event: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS  adjust_data(no SERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, job_id INTEGER, parent_job INTEGER, createdate TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(), pt_2d INTEGER[], pt_3d INTEGER[], world INTEGER[], margin_left INTEGER, margin_top INTEGER, margin_width INTEGER, margin_height INTEGER);
query_task_id: SELECT job_id FROM command ORDER BY task_id DESC
query_status: SELECT status, result_id FROM command where task_id =
